name: Michael Franks
description: '''Michael Franks''' (born September 18, 1944) is an American singer and songwriter. He has recorded with a variety of well-known artists, such as [[Peggy Lee]], [[Dan Hicks (singer)|Dan Hicks]], [[Patti Austin]], [[Art Garfunkel]], [[Brenda Russell]], [[Claus Ogerman]], [[Joe Sample]], and [[David Sanborn]]. His songs have been recorded by  [[Gordon Haskell]],  [[Shirley Bassey]], [[The Carpenters]], [[Kurt Elling]], [[Diana Krall]], [[Patti LaBelle]],  [[Lyle Lovett]], [[The Manhattan Transfer]], [[Leo Sidran]], [[Veronica Nunn]], [[Carmen McRae]], [[Ringo Starr]] and [[Natalie Cole]].
